name: Fulton Financial Corporation
description: Fulton Financial Corporation is a financial holding company headquartered in Lancaster, Pennsylvania. Established in 1982, the company operates through several banking subsidiaries, providing a comprehensive suite of financial services, including commercial and retail banking, wealth management, and insurance. Fulton Bank, the primary subsidiary, services customers across Pennsylvania, Maryland, Delaware, New Jersey, and Virginia, offering personal banking products such as checking and savings accounts, mortgages, and auto loans, as well as business banking solutions tailored to meet the needs of small to mid-sized enterprises. The corporation is committed to enhancing the financial well-being of its clients and communities through transparent practices, innovative products, and a customer-focused approach. Fulton has also embraced digital banking technologies, allowing customers to access their accounts and manage their finances conveniently. In addition to traditional banking services, Fulton Financial provides investment and trust services, helping individuals and organizations to achieve their financial goals. The company prides itself on its strong community ties and actively participates in philanthropic efforts to support local initiatives. With a focus on sustainability and responsible banking, Fulton Financial aims to create lasting value for its shareholders while contributing positively to the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Fulton Financial Corporation | Comprehensive Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Fulton Financial Corporation, a leading provider of personal and business banking services. Discover our commitment to customer satisfaction and community engagement.

faq.question: What services does Fulton Financial Corporation offer?
faq.answer: Fulton Financial offers a range of services including personal banking, business banking, wealth management, and insurance.

faq.question: Where is Fulton Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Fulton Financial is headquartered in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: When was Fulton Financial Corporation founded?
faq.answer: Fulton Financial Corporation was founded in 1982.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fulton Financial Corporation?
faq.answer: Eugene A. DePasquale is the CEO of Fulton Financial Corporation.
